about_the_game: Relive the immersive mystery you experienced in "Detective Rosie Morgan: Murder on the Thames" with this uniquely cool and intriguing original soundtrack. Let the funky electronic tracks and silky smooth jazz pieces whisk you back to those cool nights you experienced in London.
